body.name: Supergoop! Superscreen - 1.7 fl oz - SPF 40 PA+++ Hydrating Daily Moisturizer Sunscreen - Protection from UV Rays + Helps Filter Pollution & Blue Light
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 31 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 1 min
features: DOES-IT-ALL DAILY MOISTURIZER - Supergoop! Superscreen is a hydrating daily moisturizer & SPF 40 sunscreen in one, protecting your skin from UVA rays, UVB rays & infrared radiation, plus helping to filter blue light & pollution.
LIGHTWEIGHT TEXTURE - This lightweight, easy-to-absorb moisturizing cream has a bouncy texture that melts into the skin and leaves it feeling soft, smooth and hydrated.
PROTECTIVE INGREDIENTS - Our formula features a naturally occurring combination of moisturizers, antioxidants and skin repairing actives harvested from blue-green algae.
RESTORE & IMPROVE SKIN - Oxybenzone and octinoxate-free, Superscreen absorbs easily and is perfect for any skin type or tone in need of a moisture boost!

HOW TO APPLY - Apply generously and evenly as the last step in your skincare routine and 15 minutes before sun exposure. Superscreen works beautifully under primer and makeup, or can be worn completely on its own.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Does It All Superscreen is a lightweight, easy-to-absorb moisturizer and SPF 40 sunscreen in one, protecting your skin from everything it faces on a daily basis. Barely-There Feel You’ll love the bouncy, melt-into-your-skin texture that leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and hydrated. Plus, it wears beautifully under makeup! Protective Ingredients Our formula features a naturally occurring combination of moisturizers, antioxidants and skin repairing actives harvested from blue-green algae.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My go to daily moisturizer. Lightweight perfect for the Texas humidity. Wish the smell was a little lighter but it’s hardly there at all (not added fragrance) so I’m just being picky.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liquid gold for the skin!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best moisturizer I have ever used! Even a little goes a long way, and it also gives you a healthy glow without looking greasy (it is very light).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super goop sunscreen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Chemical sunscreen, not mineral
reviews.reviewText: it has the chemical sunscreens in it,. it is not a mineral only sunscreen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for thirsty skin
reviews.reviewText: I did microneedling for the first time and my usually oily skin is literally DRINKING moisturizer. I went through a single 1.7 oz container of my Murad moisturizer in a week! I was using Murad and layering SuperGoop Unseen Sunscreen over the top and wanted to try the combo product. It is rare for me to find a sunscreen that I'm not allergic to, that also has a decent SPF. This one by SuperGoop is great. It definitely leaves a shine on your skin, so I would wear this under loose powder. I'll buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wear this everyday
reviews.reviewText: I have rosacea and therefore extremely sensitive skin. It is very hard for me to find a face sunscreen that doesn’t make my skin burn or cause me to break out. This stuff is amazing! It is super super hydrating and does not irritate my skin at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unpleasant smell, but very moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this moisturizer for the past three months and I will be honest it is very moisturizing and could work great if you have dry skin like myself. The spf does not leave a white cast on my skin like other moisturizers with spf. However, the only complaint I have is the smell it is quite unpleasant but once it’s applied to the skin it slowly fades out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this moisturizer! I use it every day and under makeup. It give you a slight glow and definitely gives you a feel of instant relief from dryness. No white look or lingering sun screen smell. A bit pricy but worth it as a little goes a long way. Also FSA approved. One of the better supergoop products. Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: It's ok I guess but I'm not using it again, it will just live in my bathroom cabinet now. Firstly, the smell is very unpleasant. The feel isn't that nice and it remains a bit tacky for the rest of the day. As for a second application, get ready to wash it all off to reapply as adding more on will feel heavy and slippy. I tried it with mascara and after 2 hours, I looked quite panda like.Finally, this I should have done a bit more research on before and that's on me, but there are currently queries over the safety of Avobenzone and Homosalate. Obviously, thats up to you, but personally, I've found better products that have better ingredients and feel better for me.I can't remember if the ingredients are on here, but ta-da:Active Ingredients: Avobenzone 2.5%, Homosalate 8%, Octisalate 5%Inactive Ingredients: Water, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Oleosomes, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Polyester-7, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Neopentyl Glycol Diheptanoate, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seedcake Extract, Aphanizomenon Flos-Aquae Extract, Inulin Lauryl Carbamate, Xanthan Gum, Biosaccharide Gum-4, Cerium Oxide, Platinum Powder, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenethyl Alcohol, Chlorphenesin
